title: What If, Hope Was More Than A Pipe Dream
author: Milk_For_Camille
fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia (Anime & Manga)
relationships: Midoriya Izuku & Original Character(s), Midoriya Izuku & Takami Keigo | Hawks, Midoriya Izuku & Midoriya Izuku's Family, Hatsume Mei & Midoriya Izuku, Midoriya Izuku & Todoroki Natsuo, Midoriya Izuku & Rody Soul, Other Relationship Tags to Be Added
characters: Original Characters, Rody Soul, Takami Keigo | Hawks, Midoriya Izuku, Midoriya Izuku's Family, Midoriya Inko, Midoriya Hisashi, Hatsume Mei, Todoroki Natsuo, Other Character Tags to Be Added
freeforms: Nonbinary Character, Nonbinary Midoriya Izuku, Gender Dysphoria, Gender-Neutral Pronouns, Alternate Universe - Gender Changes, Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence, Alternate Universe, chatfic, Secret Identity, Codenames, Online Friendship, Secret Organizations, Spies & Secret Agents, Hero Public Safety Commission Bashing (My Hero Academia), Quirkless Midoriya Izuku, Midoriya Izuku is a Dork, Midoriya Izuku is Bad at Feelings, Vigilante Midoriya Izuku, Kinda?, Pilot Rody Soul, Takami Keigo | Hawks Needs a Hug, Midoriya Izuku Needs A Hug, Midoriya Izuku Needs Therapy, Takami Keigo | Hawks is a Dork, Other Additional Tags to Be Added, Tags May Change
summary:
Hope was a funny thing. It often had no basis in reality, and its lifespan was always fluctuating. In all truth, it often seemed inane to try and live with hope when reality came in with the intent to kill every last remaining piece of it. Life was not kind, and hope was not a strong enough shield to defend against its blades.
This is one of the three facts of the universe that so many kids are forced to learn early, that so many adults enforce unknowingly. Not all men are created equal, hope cannot be a shield, and everything must end one day. Truths that can’t be unlearned, truths that rule over the less fortunate while lifting up the lucky.
But like the third fact states, everything will meet its end, even the facts and truths that have lasted since the beginning of time. And sometimes, it just takes one boy to take it all down…
~
AKA, a semi-illegal online favor ring made to help the less fortunate, with some moral ambiguity, hacking, and definitely-not-vigilantism, featuring a lot of original characters.

summary:
Yeonjun is no stranger to fans shipping their group.
In theory.
He’s never thought much of it, always taking comments about his clingy nature in stride - it’s just how friends show affection, right?
Lingering touches, toe-the-line flirting, just-a-bit-too-long eye contact: Yeonjun has it under control.
He’s known Choi Soobin for seven years now, it’s not like the spark of a mild crush is enough to change anything between them.
Except, maybe it is.

author: Kinrah
fandoms: Pocket Monsters | Pokemon - All Media Types, Pocket Monsters | Pokemon (Anime)
characters: Satoshi | Ash Ketchum, Kasumi | Misty, Kenji | Tracey Sketchit, Mew (Pokemon), Freezer | Articuno, Thunder | Zapdos, Fire | Moltres, Lugia (Pokemon), Satoshi no Pikachu | Ash Ketchum's Pikachu, Marshadow (Pokemon), Kyogre (Pokemon), Shaymin (Pokemon), Densetsu no Pokemon | Legendary Pokemon
freeforms: Chatting & Messaging, Chatlogs, Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence, Anime Plotline but screwed around with, Non-Canon Pokemon, Integrating movies and bits of the games too
summary:
BB: I keep forgetting to ask, how are you finding the Orange Islands?UT: they’re great!UT: we’ve met some new friends, seen some new pokémon, and i’m on my way to the first gym!UT: we also crashed two blimps, broke dialga, and i think kyogre is stalking me.BB:UT: so it’s pretty normal!BB: Ash, that is so not normal I don’t even know where to start with you…
Ash Ketchum is fresh out of competing in the Indigo League, cheered on by both his human friends and the large cast of legendary Pokémon who were watching and commenting on the progress of his entire Kanto adventure. They weren’t supposed to interfere, but this being Ash, and they being bored, that lasted about three hours. Now Ash is tasked by Professor Oak to retrieve a mysterious artefact from his colleague in the Orange Islands. After everything that happened in Kanto, it’s safe to assume that this will totally go off without any problems and everything will be fine.
Or: It’s never safe to assume when the legendary Pokémon chatroom is involved.
Alternatively or: Having made multiple collisions and derailed, this canon train is heading straight into the sea.

title: Case Study 2: Rhodonite
author: AliceinHyruleBastion
relationships: Deuce Spade/Ace Trappola, Floyd Leech/Riddle Rosehearts (Background), Riddle Rosehearts & Ace Trappola, Kalim Al-Asim & Silver, Malleus Draconia/Yuu | Player (this was supposed to be a joke I dunno what happened), Kalim Al-Asim/Jamil Viper (very minor), other background ships
freeforms: character/relationship study, atypical soulmate au (soul-marks/tattoos & empathy link), telepathy!, Nightmares, body horror & unreality & gore & cannibalism & murder & major character death ONLY WITHIN THE DREAMS, Panic Attacks, Hurt/Comfort, So much comfort, Slow Burn, PAINFULLY slow buckle up, Crude Humor, Swearing, because me and teenage boys, (I can't believe i'm adding this tag), Accidental Voyeurism, it's not major it's for comedy, Internalized Homophobia, because it's ace, ace if you stopped lurking in doorways you wouldnt be in half the messes youre in, Texting, wow these tags make it look like this fic isn't 90 percent comedy and stupid memes, (another tag I can't believe I'm adding), Implied Sexual Content, but it's background and minor and not adeuce
summary:
When it came to his own Mark, Ace was, self-admittedly, quite clueless.
Then again, he wasn’t too certain about many other aspects of his life aside from a distinct list of things he knew were true:-His soulmate, should she exist, would of course be the perfect girl for him-Night Raven College is a boy’s academy-Said school is boring, except for the moments where everything seems to go wrong-Since his Housewarden had Overblotted, his nightmares haven’t gone away(-Deuce Spade is the first boy he’s ever found attractive—)-Deuce Spade somehow makes the nightmares go away-When Deuce isn’t with him he can’t sleep, and that realization is terrifying
These facts, combined with the volatility and stupidity of one Ace Trappola, make a ticking time bomb of a broken heart and reckless words.
—————————(Part two of my TWST soulmarks series. While this technically is able to be read as a standalone, minor knowledge and background in the first installation may be missed as well as some background relationship development.)

summary:
A young girl goes to feed a strange man's cat when he forgets, but it isn't easy avoiding one of his suspicious co-workers...And I also try to do JoJo-style flashbacks...Apparently this is one of the few active fics with "Formaggio & Formaggio's Cat (JoJo)" as a tag (may be more untagged/separately tagged)*~~~(=•́ܫ•̀=)
15/05/23And there was a postcard on the doormat....After nearly three months, was someone finally beginning to remember her? She wasn’t sure what to think anymore, and that night she slept poorly. But the idea of visiting - no, running - a café where you could go and meet cats had taken root in her mind…
*(Stand Album Pic for eighty-six's [Army of Cats] at end of Ch17. Also imagine [Funky Drummer] as a bunch of mechanical Budai/Teletubbies-like characters with long fingers and belly-drums; I can't really draw that)*After about eighteen months I've finally finished! It's nice to have finally completed one of my stories in the JoJo universe{s}...)Oh, and thanks for passing 1.1k views,  :)    I hope everyone has enjoyed this...
